name: Rubys Toy (18+)
description:
This is an Interactive Fiction game with no visuals currently. I will add visuals later in development.

In Rubys Toy you experience the story of Chris. He was assigned to a study task with Ruby, a pretty girl he has never talked to before. They start to work on the project and Chris discovers a side of Ruby he didn't expect.

Content Warning - Contains and revolves around the following sexual themes: Sexual Acts, Spanking, Domination

This is an early development version

To be added:

  • More of the story
  • Visuals
